snippet: The PowerShare Series is using retired stars like Andre Agassi and Pete Sampras to bring new tennis events to several United States cities, including some abandoned by top-level events.
abstract: PowerShare Series is using retired tennis stars like Andre Agassi and Pete Sampras to bring new tennis events to several United States cities, including some abandoned by top-level events.
lead_paragraph: The PowerShare Series is using retired stars like Andre Agassi and Pete Sampras to bring new tennis events to several United States cities, including some abandoned by top-level events.

headline.seo: Pete Sampras and Andre Agassi Among Retired Stars on Tennis Tour
headline.main: Former Stars Bring Back Fall Tennis To New York
